attribute.name: id
attribute.description: The 'id' of any HTML attribute should not contain anything besides letters and numbers

attribute.name: class
attribute.description: The 'class' of any HTML attribute is usually a single word, but it can also be a list of class names separated by spaces

attribute.name: dir
attribute.description: The 'dir' of any HTML attribute specifies the base direction of directionally neutral text

attribute.name: lang
attribute.description: The 'lang' attribute tells the browser what language the element's attribute values and content are written in

attribute.name: title
attribute.description: The 'title' attribute provides text that shows up in a 'tooltip' when a user hovers their mouse over the element

attribute.name: alt
attribute.description: The 'alt' attribute provides alternative text to users when its visual representation is not available

attribute.name: style
attribute.description: The 'style' attribute provides the ability for users to change many attributes of the tag's contents using a strict syntax

attribute.name: shape
attribute.description: The 'shape' attribute defines the shape of the selectable area

attribute.name: headers
attribute.description: The 'headers' attribute is a space-separated list of cell IDs

attribute.name: axis
attribute.description: The 'headers' attribute is a comma-separated list of related header cells

attribute.name: nowrap
attribute.description: The 'nowrap' attribute tells the browser not to wrap text that goes over one line

attribute.name: align
attribute.description: The 'align' attribute of an HTML element is a direction word, like 'left', 'right' or 'center'

attribute.name: valign
attribute.description: The 'valign' attribute of an HTML attribute is a direction word, like 'baseline','bottom','middle' or 'top'

attribute.name: scope
attribute.description: The 'scope' attribute defines what's covered by the header cells

attribute.name: sharestream-lti-url
attribute.description: used by the IMG tag inside of CKEditor to support ShareStream LTI media embedding

attribute.name: kaltura-lti-url
attribute.description: used by the IMG tag inside of CKEditor to support Kaltura LTI media embedding

attribute.name: data-
attribute.description: Allows the HTML5 'data-' attribute to be added to elements

attribute.name: aria-
attribute.description: Allows the HTML5 'aria-' attribute to be added to elements

property.name: azimuth
property.description: This property is most likely to be implemented by mixing the same signal into different channels at differing volumes.

property.name: background
property.description: The 'background' property is a shorthand property for setting the individual background properties (i.e., 'background-color', 'background-image', 'background-repeat', 'background-attachment' and 'background-position') at the same place in the style sheet.

property.name: background-attachment
property.description: If a background image is specified, this property specifies whether it is fixed with regard to the viewport ('fixed') or scrolls along with the document ('scroll').

property.name: background-color
property.description: This property sets the background color of an element, either a <color> value or the keyword 'transparent', to make the underlying colors shine through.

property.name: background-image
property.description: This property sets the background image of an element.

property.name: background-position
property.description: If a background image has been specified, this property specifies its initial position.

property.name: background-repeat
property.description: If a background image is specified, this property specifies whether the image is repeated (tiled), and how.

property.name: border-radius
property.description: This property allows you to add rounded borders to elements

property.name: border-top-left-radius
property.description: This property allows you to add rounded borders to elements

property.name: border-top-right-radius
property.description: This property allows you to add rounded borders to elements

property.name: border-bottom-right-radius
property.description: This property allows you to add rounded borders to elements

property.name: border-bottom-left-radius
property.description: This property allows you to add rounded borders to elements

property.name: border-spacing
property.description: The lengths specify the distance that separates adjacent cell borders. If one length is specified, it gives both the horizontal and vertical spacing. If two are specified, the first gives the horizontal spacing and the second the vertical spacing. Lengths may not be negative.

property.name: clip
property.description: The 'clip' property applies to elements that have a 'overflow' property with a value other than 'visible'.

property.name: counter-increment
property.description: The 'counter-increment' property accepts one or more names of counters (identifiers), each one optionally followed by an integer.

property.name: clip
property.description: The 'clip' property applies to elements that have a 'overflow' property with a value other than 'visible'.

property.name: cursor
property.description: This property specifies the type of cursor to be displayed for the pointing device.

property.name: text-shadow
property.description: This property accepts a comma-separated list of shadow effects to be applied to the text of the element.

property.name: font
property.description: The 'font' property is, except as described below, a shorthand property for setting 'font-style', 'font-variant', 'font-weight', 'font-size', 'line-height', and 'font-family', at the same place in the style sheet.

property.name: font-family
property.description: This property specifies a prioritized list of font family names and/or generic family names.

property.name: page
property.description: The 'page' property can be used to specify a particular type of page where an element should be displayed.

property.name: play-during
property.description: Similar to the 'cue-before' and 'cue-after' properties, this property specifies a sound to be played as a background while an element's content is spoken.

property.name: text-align
property.description: This property describes how inline content of a block is aligned.

property.name: voice-family
property.description: The value is a comma-separated, prioritized list of voice family names (compare with 'font-family').
